title: Samsung’s underwhelming #YouMake product customizer is finally live
content:
Samsung first revealed its ‘#YouMake’ project back in January, which aimed to add a new level of personalization and customization across the company’s electronics and appliances. It sounded like a neat idea, but now that the service is starting to go live, it’s a bit underwhelming. The new customizer is available in the United States

The post Samsung’s underwhelming #YouMake product customizer is finally live appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung first revealed its ‘#YouMake’ project back in January, which aimed to add a new level of personalization and customization across the company’s electronics and appliances. It sounded like a neat idea, but now that the service is starting to go live, it’s a bit underwhelming. The new customizer is available in the United States
